mapper.insert: insert ignore into success_killed (seckill_id, user_phone) values (#{secKilledId}, #{userPhone});
mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as "seckill.start_time", s.end_time as "seckill.end_time", s.create_time as "seckill.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{secKilledId} and sk.user_phone = #{userPhone};
